rooms.description: Entry hall with traditional Kerala stone flooring and carved wooden doors. Serves as foyer to the villa.
Spacious living area designed with traditional Kerala aesthetics including wooden beams, intricate woodwork, and tiled floors. Large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Dining space integrated within the living room with low-back chairs and a central table. Open plan layout to promote interaction.

Functional kitchen designed according to local building norms, including provisions for natural lighting and ventilation while ensuring fire safety measures. Traditional Kerala style with stone accents.
Primary bedroom located in the north-east direction for positive Vastu energy. Includes ensuite bathroom for privacy and convenience.
Secondary bedroom, adjoining storage closet. Located in a balanced position to maintain harmonious energy flow.
Ensuite bathroom attached to primary bedroom. Designed with water-efficient fixtures and natural lighting.
Area designated for laundry, storage, and other utility functions, aligned towards the west as per Vastu guidelines to promote balance in energy flow.

openings.description: Traditional wooden main door with intricate carvings, providing entry from the street, ensuring auspicious energy according to Kerala norms.
Large windows for ample sunlight and ventilation in the living room, aligning with Vastu principles.
Secondary exit door providing direct access to a private courtyard and enhancing security features.

garage.description: Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor, designed with robust Kerala-style stone finishes and ample lighting for security. Openings include reinforced entry and ventilation windows.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the first floor, providing a quiet retreat with an en-suite bathroom and natural light.
Multipurpose study room or guest area equipped with traditional Kerala aesthetics; can be used as additional bedroom or office space.
Extra storage space to accommodate household items, designed keeping local building norms in mind.

openings.description: Window overlooking the staircase for natural light and safety. Ensures that residents have a clear view of the entrance from above.

rooms.description: Rooftop terrace designed as an open space with traditional Kerala-style outdoor seating, providing views and fresh air. Includes a pergola for shade and privacy.

openings.description: Open design of the rooftop to maximize ventilation and sunlight exposure in accordance with Vastu principles.
